text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon's remarkable<n>resilience during the Battle of
the<n>Dorms sticks in my mind.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Curious how her running ability<n>compares, I make my way
to the track<n>in hopes of observing her<n>performance during
training.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
All right, lookin' good! But I know<n>you've got more where
that came<n>from!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: You mentioned before about a rival<n>you wanna defeat, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Then let that fire inside you burn even<n>brighter!

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am! Will do!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I arrive to see her training alongside<n>one of the younger
students.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Good, then it's time for another lap!<n>Let's do this!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Amazon's footwork is dynamic and<n>powerful as she
speeds around the<n>track.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Go, go, gooo!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Although her positioning leaves<n>something to be desired,
she<n>manages to seize the lead by sheer<n>force of will.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I find myself drawn to her fearless<n>style of running, which
seems to be a<n>direct reflection of her personality<n>itself.

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much, Hishiama! Ican't wait to train with you again!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You bet! Must be dog-tired, huh?<n>Make sure to eat a good
meal, and<n>take a nice, hot bath afterwards.

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am! See you next time!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Careful, now! Don't want any<n>tumbles! Heh... Her
expression's<n>really toughened up.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
At this rate, it won't be long before<n>she turns into a
formidable rival in her<n>own right!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Who're you? Oh, a badge. So<n>you're a trainer at the
school?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: And I don't just sound like it—Iam having fun! There's nothin'better than seeing the youngsters get stronger right before my eyes!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
After all, that just means I'll have my<n>pick of opponents to
race one-on-one!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hoo boy, this is exactly why TracenAcademy is the best! There aresuper strong Umamusume everywhere you look!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
And I'm gonna take 'em all on and<n>get even stronger
myself! I'll go<n>one-on-one against everyone in the<n>
Twinkle Series if I have to!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: That's just how I roll!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
True to her words, Amazon spends<n>her days competing
against practically<n>every Umamusume she crosses<n>paths
with.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Time for a one-on-one, Fuji! This<n>time, let's see who can
hold their<n>breath longer underwater!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, that sounds like a rather risky<n>endeavor... Hey, I
know! What say we<n>include a rule that you're allowed to<n>
make your opponent laugh?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You little trickster... But sure, I'm cool<n>with it! You know me—I
never shy<n>away from a challenge!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Cough, cough! Huff, puff... Damnyou, Fuji! Resorting to tickling? That'splayin' dirty!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hahaha! Your sides are too easy a<n>target to resist.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huh? Hold up, Biko. Think you could<n>repeat that?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
I said—let's have a hero pose<n>showdown, Hishiama! We'll
see<n>which of us is more like an ally of<n>justice!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Huh... Not sure I get it, but if we're<n>talkin' a one-on-one,
then I'm all in!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Like this? Hup! Hngh! Haaah!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Whew... Oh, fancy seeing you again.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Well, tryouts are just around the<n>corner. I can't be lazing
around when<n>my big debut's on the line.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I gotta show off my skills during the<n>race and get myself a
trainer with a<n>fiery spirit!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Like I said before, it's not enough<n>going one-on-one with
students here<n>at the school. I gotta throw down with<n>the
Twinkle Series crowd too!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hahaha! Well, can you blame me at a<n>school like this?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: But I guess I kinda get it from my<n>mom too.
choice_data_list: Did your mother used to race?
Did your mother used to race?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Sure did! She only ever competed<n>overseas though. Yep,
that's<n>right—you wouldn't know it, but I used<n>to live
abroad too!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
My mom was pretty big over there,<n>I'll have you know. I
really looked up<n>to her—that's part of what got me into<n>
racing.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
But the first time I experienced a race<n>firsthand was when I
came to Japan<n>to watch the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I'll never forget the thrill of watching<n>those crazy speed
demons battle it<n>out!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I was all, "Whoa, awesome!Lemme at 'em! I wanna goone-on-one with those badasses!"And I leapt right out of my seat!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Haha! Nah, my mom grabbed me by<n>the scruff of the neck
and sat me right<n>back down.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Boy, was she pissed. It's funthinking back on the race and all, butI'd rather not remember thatpart.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems the excitement and longing<n>for the world of
competition that she<n>felt back then made Amazon who she<n>
is today.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, what's this? Didja fall prey to my<n>wily charms just
now, hmm?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
But I've got bad news for ya! I'm not<n>gonna let myself be
scouted 'til after<n>tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: There's no rule against it or anything,but that's what I've decided. I wantyou and the other trainers to witnesswhat I can do in a real race.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Mark my words—you're gonna see<n>somethin' real special!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
What sort of running will this<n>go-getter show us at tryouts? I
can't<n>wait to find out.
